name: Pair of Aces (itch)
description:
Pair of Aces is an homage to the 1984's Bally/Midway video game "Two Tigers".  Fly your fighter bomber and take out the enemy ships by bombing holes in them, or dropping enemy fighter wreckage -- but hurry up!  You only have a limited time to sink the ship before it escapes!

Play single player or 2-player local multiplayer.  Gamepads (XBox-One, PS/4, and Switch) are supported (and recommended) along with keyboard control.

Pair of Aces is currently in Alpha, and there are bugs, but it is stable and playable!
